this_title: Brave New World with Stephen Hawking
introduction: Professor Stephen Hawking presents a global exploration of the scientific breakthroughs that are transforming our lives in the 21st cent ury.With the help of some of the world's leading scientific figures - including Sir David Attenborough, Richard Dawkins, Aarathi Prasad, Lord Winston and Maggie Aderin-Pocock - this five-part series reveals how science is striving for humankind's next leap forward.英國著名物理學家霍金於一連五集的《霍金新紀元》內，將揭示廿一世紀改變人類生活的科學發展。幾位知名科學家，包括大衛．愛登堡爵士（Sir David Attenborough）、理查德．道金斯（Richard Dawkins）等將擔任主持，走訪世界不同國家，向觀眾介紹足以影響人類未來的重要發現。Episode 1 : MachinesEpisode 2 : HealthEpisode 3 : TechnologyEpisode 4 : EnvironmentEpisode 5 : Biology
